abilities.desc: At the start of your turn, you may place up to three Walls into empty adjacent spaces.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

abilities.desc: You can see and target enemies through Walls.

actions.name: Walled In
actions.desc:
Place up to 3 Walls into empty spaces within Range 1-3.
6+: Place up to 3 Walls into empty spaces within Range 1-3, then you may swap spaces with one Wall placed by Walled In.

actions.name: Icicle Fall
actions.desc:
Deal 1 damage to each enemy adjacent to any Walls.
7+: Deal 2 damage instead, then give 1 Weakness token to each enemy dealt damage by Icicle Fall.
